snippet: Iran’s leaders warned of sectarian conflict after reports that Syrian rebels had raided a shrine outside Damascus and made off with the remains of the figure buried there.
abstract: Iran’s Shiite leaders warn of regional sectarian conflict after reports that Syrian rebels have raided Shiite shrine in suburb of Damascus, destroying the site and making off with remains of revered Shiite figure buried there.

byline.original: By THOMAS ERDBRINK and HANIA MOURTADA

lead_paragraph: Iran’s leaders warned of sectarian conflict after reports that Syrian rebels had raided a shrine outside Damascus and made off with the remains of the figure buried there.

headline.seo: Iran Warns Syrian Rebels After Report of Shrine Desecration
headline.main: Iran Warns Syrian Rebels After Report of Shrine Desecration
headline.print_headline: Iran Warns Syrian Rebels After Report of Shrine Desecration
